name: Discard - A Memory Game
description:
Discard is a fun memory game with a twist.

You have 3 seconds to memorise a selection of playing cards. When ready, tap the right cards to advance to the next level. As the rounds progress, the difficulty will also increase.

The app features haptics which enhance the overall experience.

Also included are:

• An option to toggle between English Pattern cards and a custom deck

• Dark mode support

• Game Center leaderboards - to see players' high-score

• Multiple app icons - to allow you to customise the app to suit your style

• Siri Shortcuts - to make starting a game easier

• Voiceover support


Help and Stats are available to let you know how to play and how well you are playing.
